-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, co(c1, cress, c0))
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

body.origin:
|- diffsc(s0, co(c1, cress, c0))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, cress)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csdrg, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cinvr, c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

|- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csdrg, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cdr), wcel(c0, cfv(csubrg, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c0))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c1))

-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(SubDRing ` c1)↔(c1 ∈ DivRing ∧ c0 ∈(SubRing ` c1)∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 \ { c2 }),(c3 ` s0)∈ c0)))
⊣ c2 =(0 ` c1)
⊣ c3 =(invr ` c1)
⊣ d(s0, c1)
⊣ d(s0, c0)
⊣ d(s0, c2)
